MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL51, LL52, LL53 and LL54 postcode areas of Garndolbenmaen, Criccieth, Pwllheli and Caernarfon. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:30PM due to  faulty equipment. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 2:30PM. We will update this message if the situation changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:47AM on 12th March 2021
